title: These Vayne buffs on the PBE lol
body:
> Vayne
* Tumble (Q):
Auto applies two stacks of W
Bonus damage no longer crits.
* Silver Bolts (W):
Bonus True Damage increased from 6/7.5/9/10.5/12% to 6/8/10/12/14%
Minimum Damage changed from 40/60/80/100/120 to 50/65/80/95/110
* Final Hour (R):
New Effect: "While under the effects of Final Hours, Vayne is revitalized when enemy champions she has damaged recently are killed, healing for 20% of their maximum health"

Some rioter on the game balance team lost in silver playing Vayne again rip

replies.body: That's a huge ass buff to her early game.  Auto + Auto reset from Q is an almost instant w proc and they increased the early game base damage on it.  They nerfed Vayne back in Season 3/4 so she could specifically not get instant w procs off.  Are they high

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6si6q6/88_pbe_update/dldb9n9/

apparently that was a bug

Still, those buffs are probably ricklessabandon's ideas. The same guy who decided that buffing waveclear and nerfing damage on an assassin was fine. The same guy well know because he kinda ruins every champion he touches. The same guy who works in Riot's balance team, but almost never plays and doesn't like the game. 

I don't want to be that guy, bugs aside all those changes are going to live. Remember when LB W gutting was "extremely experimental"? Lol.

they actually wanted le bl to be dead that patch


Little did they know they added an interaction in which clones proc on hits unnintentionally

So say hi to 
{{item:3145}} {{item:3057}} {{item:3100}} 


Sad part is people think gunblade is the problem XDDDDD

Nothing to do with gunblade you dont even want to fuse revolver early on and later on protobelt is better unless vs heavy poke teams without ocean / vs something which needs to be instaggibed like fed vayne 



I still have scars from them removing
E>aa mechanic on vayne infact i find her clunky to play since that 


Q,AA WAIT A BIT(Unless high AS) E ,AA used to be her combo which drained bunch of her mana but y fk riot though its unhealthy

And now they are adding double proc on Q XD????????????



Sounds healthy {{item:3124}}

>  Are they high

where were u when we were looking for someone to turn to when they wanted to buff akali

Post buff Akali is still lower in every statistical case than Vayne is currently. She has a fractionally lower win rate, a lower pick rate by a lot and a lower ban rate.

These are very different cases.

I was running away from home on my giant flying bison and then fell into the ocean and trapped myself in a huge frozen ball of ice for 100 years and then woke up in the middle of a war with a tattoo of an arrow on my head.

finally i found you hehe xd

now
let me teach u how to mek fire
ok pew pew hehe
wait doesnt work for me anymore :(
We must visit the dargons then
ok and then we do the fusion dance lul
Coming from someone who uses full crit damage runes, this is a massive nerf late game as well

>  full crit damage runes

There's your problem lol
Fuck are you talking about
why are you using crit damage runes

You're right. 

He should be using EXP runes instead.

1) You are a serious minority for someone to use full crit runes.

2) Crit runes will disappear soon anyway.
are they retarded? this is completely busted.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ndAjhj78,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-08-09T08:03:49.323+0000)
>
> are they retarded? this is completely busted.

As a top lane main, she earned my ban next patch if these changes go through lol.

I think it's specifically supposed to solidify her as a tank buster.

Her Q no longer critting means she can't 2-shot other squishies anymore. The minimum damage on her silver bolts was also reduced at higher ranks, making them less effective VS squishy targets.

The healing will mostly be substantial when she kills tanks, since it's based on her target's health.

Don't get me wrong, I'm raising my eyebrow too... But I see the direction they're trying to go.
There's nothing saying her Q can't crit. It says the bonus damage can't, so she'll likely still crit with the base damage anyway.
Yeah, but that won't be any worse than a regular crit. It was the bonus damage critting that made her burst squishies like an Assassin.
I don't think anybody has ever been bothered by never seeing Vayne in their games.

Why???

Good name op.
Thanks lad
at least its a nerf vs squishies tho
It's not. Her Silver Bolts can be applied in 2 AAs now and deals more damage, she'll burst squishies just as hard and tanks harder.

Thats a bug that they are changing
Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6si6q6/88_pbe_update/dldb9n9/

frankly i don't understand what the fuss is about considering the double proc on the Q is a BUG.

so taken that into account the bonus dmg from Q no longer crit ? it is a nerf period and a big one at that.

The W gain up to 2% of max hp....omg now you're gonna die because of that....plz give me a break will you. how is 2% extra % spread on 3 autos (which means an extra 0.66% per autos) broken ? Even on a 3Khp target that's 60extra dmg on the proc or an extra 20 dmg per autos. that barely qualify as a proper buff when put in perspective with the Q nerf.

the R : most of the time vayne is already either dying or killing everyone. You're essentially making a fed vayne even harder to deal with while not increasing her easiness to snowball at all. I don't know what to think about this buff that is quite strong indeed But I find it quite odd and I play vayne a ton. To be honest I don't like it.

Good part: She now needs to basic attack you 3 times and not once with Q crit to kill you.

Bad part : You can't kill her.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/022/523/C1mGBSvWEAANu9k.jpg
A strong Vayne invalidates tanks. Why are they buffing the one part of Vayne that cannot be counterbuilt?

what the duck, this better be followed up with R loses all bonus movement and AD ratios on active or vayne loses all true damage effects vs those within a similar HP threshold as her.

Seriously if these changes go live she will be pick, ban or lose tier and somehow that won't warrant a hot fix...
No, her R was also buffed to heal her for each takedown.... 20% of killed person's maximum HP. Vayne kills a tank? +1000 HP.
That just scream "we buff her to see her on LC$"

kill sion, + full hp kill his passive + full hp


yea fuck that

permaban incoming
she's getting a new skin soon

goddammit...Ghostcrawler hit the martini's too hard again.

(click link for context: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/3ErqAdtq/d/ydAqrpb4?comment=000300030003000000010000 )
Whenever vayne is popular she is a plague on the meta... why....
vayne isnt even weak tho, let alone weak enough for a buff of this magnitude
Ah yes, let's hyper buff a champion that's already super strong! What could go wrong?

So lets think about this...

A level 6 vayne can prolly lets say get 4 Q's at least when ulti is on..

with max W, 14% true damage x 4 = 56 % true damage without adding the normal Q damage and aa's and support if there was one... 

Although its bro math, but seems like 40-50% true damage and invis and dash and damage steriod and ad steriod is a lot?

But who are we to judge we are all wood 5 and pro players are the only vayne players.

>with max W, 14% true damage x 4 = 56 % true damage without adding the normal Q damage and aa's and support if there was one... 

To get 4 W's off on someone you would have to auto them 12 times.  

If you let Vayne (or anyone) auto you 12 times in a fight then you deserve to die.  

I don't think you really thought that through.
What the actual fuck is this
What the actual fuck?
No. NO. **AND FUCKING NO!** That Heal-on-kill Buff is too much.
What is this ? what the heck. are these buffs a prank ?
Atleast shiv+IE vayne won't Q me for 1k dmg
